Description: Build the orchestrator and core infrastructure
Build the main orchestrator agent that coordinates all specialist agents. Must handle sequential and parallel execution patterns.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Orchestrator can invoke sub-agents in correct order
- Context passes between agents correctly  
- Error handling at orchestration level works
- Observability traces capture full workflow

Description: Implement persistent state management with short-term and long-term memory.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Short-term memory tracks current workflow state
- Long-term memory stores successful patterns
- Context window stays under 50K tokens
- Memory cleanup happens after completion

Description: Build all specialist agents following ADK patterns
Create agent that analyzes product descriptions and defines marketing strategy.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Analyzes product description effectively
- Defines clear target audience
- Outputs structured JSON (validated schema)
- Response time < 30 seconds
- Quality score > 8/10

Description: Create agent that writes persuasive copy for landing pages.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Creates compelling headlines
- Writes benefit-focused copy
- Outputs structured JSON
- Uses emotional triggers effectively
- Quality score > 8/10

Description: Create agent that defines design specifications including colors, typography, and layout.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Defines color palettes
- Specifies typography
- Creates layout structure
- Outputs valid design tokens
- Quality score > 8/10

Description: Create agent that generates production-ready HTML/CSS/JavaScript code.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Generates valid HTML/CSS/JS
- Code is responsive (mobile-first)
- Follows accessibility standards
- No security vulnerabilities
- Quality score > 8/10
Dependencies: Story: Build Copywriter Agent, Story: Build UI/UX Designer Agent, Story: Build SEO Specialist Agent

Description: Create agent that optimizes landing pages for search engines.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Generates meta tags
- Defines schema markup
- Creates Open Graph tags
- Quality score > 7/10
Dependencies: Story: Build Marketing Strategy Agent, Story: Build Copywriter Agent

Description: Add quality control and iterative improvement
Create agent that reviews landing pages and provides quality feedback.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Reviews final landing page
- Identifies quality issues
- Provides actionable feedback
- Can approve or request changes

Description: Build iterative improvement cycle using LoopAgent pattern.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Loop runs max 3 iterations
- Improvements are measurable
- Loop terminates on approval
- Handles infinite loop prevention

Description: Extend agent capabilities with proper tools
Add sandboxed code validation capability for the developer agent.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Can execute Python/JavaScript safely
- Sandboxed execution environment
- Returns execution results
- Handles errors gracefully

Description: Setup external storage for large outputs to prevent context window bloat.
Acceptance Criteria:
- External storage configured (S3/GCS)
- Artifact save/retrieve implemented
- Artifact references work in context
- Tested with large HTML files

Description: Production-ready monitoring and quality measurement
Add distributed tracing to track agent workflows end-to-end.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Every agent call is traced
- Traces show full workflow path
- Can debug failures from traces
- Spans include agent inputs/outputs

Description: Implement automated quality evaluation using LLM-as-judge pattern.
Acceptance Criteria:
- LLM-as-judge evaluates outputs
- Golden dataset of 20+ test cases
- Automated regression testing
- Quality scores tracked over time

Description: Implement circuit breaker to prevent cascading failures in agent system.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Circuit breaker prevents cascade failures
- Auto-recovery after timeout
- Alerts trigger when circuit opens
- Configurable thresholds

Description: Create real-time dashboard for monitoring agent performance and quality.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Real-time metrics displayed
- Alert thresholds configured
- Cost tracking per request
- Quality trends visible

Description: Add retry logic, fallbacks, and graceful degradation for agent failures.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Exponential backoff retry works
- Fallback to templates on critical failure
- Human alerts for unrecoverable errors
- Error patterns logged for analysis

Description: Ensure production security standards
Add validation and sanitization for all user inputs to prevent injection attacks.
Acceptance Criteria:
- All inputs validated against schema
- SQL injection prevented
- XSS patterns blocked
- Malicious code detected

Description: Sanitize agent outputs before display to users.
Acceptance Criteria:
- PII detection and masking
- Active content removed (scripts)
- URLs validated against allowlist
- Sensitive data flagged

Description: Conduct comprehensive security review before production.
Acceptance Criteria:
- OWASP Top 10 tested
- Penetration testing complete
- Security report generated
- All high-risk issues resolved

Description: Optimize system performance and cost
Add logic to keep context window under 50K tokens.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Context automatically pruned
- Most relevant info retained
- Pruning logged for debugging
- Performance impact < 5%

Description: Tune parallel agent execution for maximum speed.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Parallel speedup > 2x sequential
- Resource usage optimized
- Timeouts configured properly
- Load balanced across workers

Description: Add detailed cost tracking per request and per agent.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Cost tracked per agent call
- Token usage logged
- Budget alerts configured
- Cost optimization suggestions

Description: Create comprehensive documentation
Document the system architecture and design decisions.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Architecture diagrams created
- Design patterns documented
- ADK patterns explained
- Decision log maintained

Description: Write operations runbook for common issues and troubleshooting.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Common issues documented
- Troubleshooting steps clear
- Alert response procedures
- Escalation paths defined

Description: Create end-user guide for non-technical users.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Step-by-step instructions
- Screenshots included
- Common questions answered
- Examples provided
